Class ByteVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lowagie.text.pdf.hyphenation.ByteVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ByteVector
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class implements a simple byte vector with access to the underlying array.
    Author:
    Carlos Villegas
    See Also:
